name: Wolfenstein RPG
description:
Wolfenstein RPG is a game developed by id Software and Firemint. It was originally released in 2009. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Wolfenstein RPG is available on iOS.
It was produced by Katherine Anna Kang. It was directed by Katherine Anna Kang. It was scored by Christian Antkow and Matthew C. Ross.
